Major_Arcs.title: The Origin of Human Meteor and Initial Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, his origin, and sets up the initial conflict and investigation into a potential threat involving a yacht and submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Human Meteor and the initial underwater setting, hinting at a conflict with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd, as a taxi driver, picks up suspicious passengers and becomes aware of being followed, shifting the scene to land and introducing a new layer of intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Street Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor after a speeding sedan catches his attention, leading to an immediate confrontation with the car's occupants.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Plan Formulation
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, a new plot is revealed about a yacht and submarine, prompting Duke to devise a plan involving Toby to investigate.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Underwater Battle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the infiltration of the yacht, the discovery of the submarine plot, and the subsequent underwater confrontation with enemy divers.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Observation and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Pete's observations on the yacht deck lead to Duke's investigation inside the cabin, culminating in a startling discovery and fall overboard.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Underwater Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Namor's arrival and dive lead to an underwater encounter with divers and the revelation of the torpedo loading operation on a sunken submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter
Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle

sub_scenes.title: Surface Attack and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The conflict extends to the surface, with Namor attacking the ship and a diver escaping the underwater battle.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Yacht Plot and Domestic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the yacht and submarine plot, transitions through the discovery of Peter's betrayal, and ends with a domestic scene at home.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Death
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht and discovers Peter's body, leading to the revelation of Peter's treachery.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet
Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads confronting 'Nazi Fiends' and a separate mystery involving an ambulance and injured person.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads in a confrontational scene with 'Nazi Fiends'.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: Boys observe an ambulance, and their curiosity leads to the discovery of a dropped wallet and a clue pointing to a garage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Garage Observation and Major Bronson Mystery
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage and observe a marine saluting a civilian, who is revealed to be Major Bronson, adding a layer of mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

Major_Arcs.title: Mr. Horst Encounter and Nazi Spy Ring Unveiling
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the boys' encounter with Mr. Horst, their capture, and the unfolding plot involving a Nazi spy ring, culminating in a violent confrontation and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Retrieval and Capture by Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys attempt to retrieve the wallet but are intercepted by police and taken to Mr. Horst, leading to their capture.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, while a sinister plan to eliminate them using carbon monoxide is devised.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Intervention and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes violently, leading to a chaotic fight, the revelation of a Nazi spy ring, and the arrival of Marines to resolve the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America: Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and his adventures in South America, focusing on the kidnapping of Rosita and the initial confrontation with local authorities.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and the setting in a sleepy South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Plot Exposition
sub_scenes.description: Champ is interrogated by local officers, leading to confusion and his decision to seek help from the American Consul, while officers reveal the kidnapping of Rosita by El Tigre.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Hideout and Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the unfolding plot of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre, the rescue plan, the infiltration of the hideout, and the eventual confrontation and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition of El Tigre's demands and a forced car journey leading to a house and encounter with Rosita's mother.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation at Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Preparation for and execution of infiltration at El Tigre's hideout, using stage dollars as a diversion, leading to a confrontation with El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Rosita and Broader Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Search for Rosita intensifies, leading to personal humiliation and revelations about Axis agents and misused identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear
Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Recognition
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission concludes with recognition of bravery and the arrival of government troops.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan: Jungle Conflict and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, dealing with international spies, compromised plans, and betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, followed by a grave report about disobedience and compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks someone into the jungle, faces a dart attack, and is swarmed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and interrogated, leading to a forced note and apparent betrayal for the sake of 'fatherland'.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Jungle Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Dolan expresses regret and a fiery diversion is set, leading to pursuit through the burning jungle.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins: The Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a complex plot involving racketeering and sacrifice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker's murder at the Weston Call newspaper.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane begin their investigation, gathering information and receiving a lead about a sick child in the hospital connected to the suspect.

narrative_arcs.title: Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child
Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly
Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Brawl, and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A chase ensues, leading to a roadblock and a street brawl, ultimately resolved by police intervention and arrests.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: Emergency medical response to injuries, a community blood drive initiated to help Tom Reilly, and his eventual recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance
Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
